attributes.action: Keep all Primary and Secondary Schools closed until September?
attributes.additional_details:
Because it is scientifically proven as not safe.
Below are some links to articles proving my point:
https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/education-52650259
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/may/19/only-5-of-teachers-think-it-safe-to-reopen-english-schools-poll-shows
https://www.bbc.com/news/education-52733452
attributes.background: Change the school reopening date for both Primary and Secondary schools until at least September.
